question:
Consider the following statements about the indigenously developed fecal incontinence management system “Qora”:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
  2. It aims to bring innovation in developing affordable medical devices
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because it is an initiative under the Ministry of Science & Technology. Second statement is correct because the technology aims to bring innovation in developing affordable medical devices.
